text: Hi, I was wondering if there was a avant / base of a landing page using react for HubSpot knocking about? Would be really helpful to understand how things should be configured etc as I’m unsure if there’s any quirks to be aware of in building components for the HubL fields etc. If anyone has anything on this I’ll gladly buy them a :beer:.
This is something we are actively working on, so we will be in touch when it is in beta!

Hey, people! How's it going? I'm new here and I'd like to share a question (my first one :hamsterdance:):
Can I track and collect data from events directly? I've been doing this using a third-party framework on my website (it tracks sesssion, duration, interactions and many other stuff) but I'd like to know if I can do this whilst using HubSpot only. I've read some info on HubSpot's marketing and events API, which can get me some data with the Web Analytics route, but it's still in beta phase and there aren't many variables in this route as there are in the framework I've been using already.
Kind regards :heart:
Hey guys Im new here :slightly_smiling_face: just wanted to say HI :wave:

question about Primary domain, if I have primary domain which is a sub-domain (I,e, <http://us.website.com|us.website.com>) and I change the primary domain to a www sub-domain (I.e. <http://www.website.com|www.website.com>), will all the webpages using the old primary domain sub-domain be updated automatically or will that change have to happen manually/with api script?
